ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:07:21 [Issue ID 4000-158921] urn:comicvine:4000-158921 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 16:58:02. [Issue ID 242099]
ComicInfo.Summary: With the ages long war between the Vampire and Werewolf Nations finally over, the surviving WetWorks teamp members hoped to be able to start their lives anew. Unfortunately, they found themselves summoned instead to the headquarters of International Operations, where the mysterious Dominique Faust asked these former Team 7 soldiers to once again become I.O.'s official strike team. Not trusting I.O. to determine their missions, the team rejected her offer. In retaliation, Dominique had WetWorks arrested on charges of treason and desertion, and placed them in a hi-tech prison. In the end, however, it turned out that Dane had a plan all along. WetWorks easily escaped their confinement, and proved to Dominique just how powerful and elusive they couls be. The team then returned to her office and agreed to work for I.O.... but only on their terms!
ComicInfo.Title: Maximum Security
